# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="ea58a-102">Kako da pronađete opcije u Outlook.com postavkama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea58a-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ea58a-103">Na vrhu stranice izaberite ikonu zupčanika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea58a-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="ea58a-104">da biste otvorili postavke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea58a-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ea58a-105">Na dnu okna postavke izaberite stavku [**Prikaži sve Outlook postavke**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea58a-105">At the bottom of the Settings pane, select [**View all Outlook settings**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ea58a-106">To će prikazati Opšte postavke i opcije za opšte, e-poštu, kalendar i (ako je primenljivo) Premium.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ea58a-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
